body.p: Touching the “Load” button icon on the Home Screen displays the “Load” screen.
The Load Screen displays the various phases of Sources, Outputs, and Total KVA, along with any trending that occurs.

The Bar Chart panel on the upper half of the screen displays the three phases (Phase A, B, and C) for Source 1 Amps, Source 2 Amps, Output Amps, and Output KVA. The last three columns are Total Output KVA, Peak Output KVA, and Total Output KW, and have only one graphic bar.
All graphic bars start green, but will turn yellow when they reach 80% or higher and will turn red when they reach 100% or higher.
The Trend panel on the lower half of the screen represents the total KVA trending that occurs over time. The bar will fluctuate with the ebb and flow of KVA.
